reviewHighlights.text: this game sucks you cant see it through tears. jokes aside, life changing game, thank me later... or dont, when youre sobbing.
My friend gifted me this for my birthday. What a fun and silly game. I loved the humor and the battle system was very enjoyable. I think someone start...
